sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms

sections.title: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: DuckBuck is a walkie-talkie style communication app that operates over the internet. The App is designed to maintain connection to communication channels even when the application is not actively in use or has been terminated by the system.

sections.title: 3. Background Operation Consent
sections.content: You explicitly acknowledge and consent that DuckBuck will: (a) run in the background of your device; (b) automatically reconnect to channels when your device restarts or the app is terminated; (c) use system resources including battery, data, and processing power even when not actively in use; and (d) receive and transmit audio data when connected to a channel, even if the app is not in the foreground.
